summary: Armageddon is a sword that is inspired by a weapon from wow.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://www.dropbox.com/s/imqe8utkolzpmz7/armageddon%20V1%20and%20V2.JPG[/img]

A friend i have asked me to make a sword inspired by Armageddon from wow so i did and the result was Armageddon V1 but he did not like the look so i did like he ask and the result was Armageddon V2. I was thinking it would be fun to hear what people think look's best :)

-------------------------
Credits:
-------------------------
I would like to tank Wiikki for teaching me a lot of things that i used to make this sword and also for letting me use some of his textures :-)
author: Rantala123
